name: It was all for nothing
description:
Introduction

To be honest, I don't know what I was doing, but it kinda turned out to be like this, it's too easy to be called a platformer and too short to be called a visual novel, so am not really sure about what the game genre is.

I'm not going to say anything about the story since I don't fully understand it myself, but you can imagine everything yourself, what is the Sickono souls and what is going on in the game, we can turn it into fan fiction :3

Controls

left and right arrow keys to go left and right
Space to jump
Up arrow key to interact. 

Credits

Code & Game Design: Fenyx
Graphics: 0x72
Music: VIVEK ABHISHEK / Frikhx
Special Thanks: Tempy / hhBuffed 

check out Frikhxs' Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/mansourisnotnice
